#summary usage for the client and service

= Usage =

== The prebakery Service ==
{{{
prebakery --root=<client-root-directory> [--ignore=<ignore-pattern>] [--umask=<umash>]  [--tools=<tools-path>] [<plan-file> ...]
}}}

will start up the bakery service.  It will write create a {{{.prebake}}} [PrebakeDirectory directory] if there is none already.

|| {{{--root}}} || a [ClientRoot directory] containing all [SourceFile]s || ||
|| {{{--ignore}}} || a regex of file paths to ignore || E.g. {{{\.bak$|/\.svn/}}} ignores files that end with ".bak" and ".svn" directories and their contents. ||
|| {{{--umask}}} || [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Umask mask] for permissions on all built files || In octal ||
|| {{{--tools}}} || a search path for [ToolFile tools] || ||
|| {{{<plan-file>}}} || paths to [PlanFile plan] files. || If none supplied, defaults to {{{<client-root-directory>/recipe.js}}} ||

== The bake command ==
{{{
bake <verb> <target> ...
}}}

will connect to a {{{prebakery}}} by looking for a {{{.prebake}}} [PrebakeDirectory directory] in an ancestorward traversal and run a build.
